subsystem_usable_characters.description: Subsystem names shall only use single-byte alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) and single-byte underscore (_). Line breaks, spaces, double-byte characters, and control characters are prohibited.

subsystem_no_numbers_at_start.description: Subsystem name shall not begin with a number.

subsystem_no_underscore_at_start.description: Subsystem name shall not begin with an underscore.

subsystem_no_underscore_at_end.description: Subsystem name shall not end with an underscore.

subsystem_no_consecutive_underscores.description: Subsystem name shall not contain consecutive underscores.

subsystem_not_reserved_matlab_word.description: Subsystem name shall not consist solely of a single reserved MATLAB keyword.

subsystem_max_name_length.description: Subsystem name length shall be a maximum of 63 characters.
